definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effective nursing in three-stage prevention of periodontitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索一种有效落实牙周病的三期预防的护理措施。

sentences.english: Alveolar bone resorption and formation of periodontal pocket are considered to be cardinal of the periodontal disease.
sentences.chinese: 牙槽骨吸收和牙周袋形成是牙周病的最主要症状。

sentences.english: Clinical and visible the periodontosis that causes by dental pulp disease changes.
sentences.chinese: 临床可见由牙髓病引起的牙周病变。

sentences.english: The researchers report their findings in the Journal of Periodontology.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员于牙周病杂志中报道了他们的发现。

sentences.english: The patient was diagnosed as Papillon -Lefèvre syndrome based on special features.
sentences.chinese: 根据以上特点诊断为掌跖角化症并发牙周病。

sentences.english: Most people with lung abscess will be found to have periodontal disease .
sentences.chinese: 多数肺脓肿患者可发现有牙周病。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, cucumber juice has certain effect in preventing and controlling the damage of gum and periodontal disease.
sentences.chinese: 黄瓜汁对牙龈损坏及对牙周病的防治也有一定的功效。

sentences.english: Wear and tear of tooth of the person that weigh, produce occlusive scar, can produce periodontosis to change.
sentences.chinese: 重者牙齿磨耗，产生咬合创伤，可以产生牙周病变。

sentences.english: Bacteria in plaque also cause gingivitis and other periodontal diseases.
sentences.chinese: 菌斑中的细菌还可以导致牙龈炎及其他牙周病。

sentences.english: Gum disease can be treated by a special dentist called a periodontist.
sentences.chinese: 牙周病可由特殊的牙周病医师来治疗。

sentences.english: Gum disease can be treated by a special dentist called a periodontist.
sentences.chinese: 牙周病可由特殊的牙周病医师来治疗。

sentences.english: The mildest form of gum disease is gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 牙周病的最温和的形式是牙龈炎。

sentences.english: Periodontitis bone defect is one cause of tooth loss.
sentences.chinese: 牙周病骨缺损是临床牙齿松动脱落的主要原因之一。

definition: caries/rotten tooth (colloquial)/see also 齲齒|龋齿[qu3 chi3]
